patterns: My computer wont turn on help
responses: If your computer doesn't turn on, your first step should be to check your power supply and monitor. If that doesn't help, you can try to reinstall your system. I can help you with that as well, when you ask me for it.

patterns: How do I reinstall my system help
Please help me with reinstalling my system
responses: Reinstalling windows involves a lot of steps, I can recomend you this video by HelpCloud. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l9GnWYKyyYo

patterns: My internet is slow and I can't work with it
responses: If you Internet is slow, you should try to restart your modem/router first. If you don't achive any results with that it's most likely a problem with your internet provider, that you can't solve by yourself. You should contact you provider in that case.

If your Internet doesn't work at all, you should first make shure it is enabled on your device. You can also try to connect with other devices, to see if your device or the whole network doesn't work. If you don't get a connection from any of your devices you should try to restart your modem/router and contact your provider, if you don't achive any results with that.

patterns: My computer takes long to load
My laptop takes forever to load
responses: If your computer gets slower over time, you most likely installed programms, that drain your performance. To find out, open the Task Manager. You can right-click your taskbar and select the “Task Manager” option. Look for programms that use a lot of Memory or CPU. Try to uninstall theas programms. If all that doen't help, you should try to reinstall windows. I can help you with that as well, if you ask me to.

patterns: The fan in my computer doesnt work help
responses: If your fan doesn't spin, that is a big problem for your computer. You should try to open your computer or laptop and see, if there is anything blocking the fan. Dust for example can stop the fan from spinning. If that doesn't help you should try to change it. It is important, that you don't use your computer without cooling. It can and will permanently damage it.

If you have problems printing, you should first try to restart your printer. If that desn't solve the problem, the issue is most likely related to your computer. You should check, if the drivers for the printer are up to date. Often the solution can be as simple as setting it up again.

patterns: I have got a blue screen
responses: If your computer crashes, you most likely have a storage issue. Make your that the drive, that contains your operating system, is connected right. A crash can also be cuased, if you hvae too little storage for updates left. If all of that is not the case your next attempts at fixing the problem should be to reinstall windows. I can give you a hand with that, if you ask me for it.

patterns: There is no sound or audio on my computer
I domt have sound on my laptop
responses: If your sound doesn't work, you should first go to your sounds menu and right click your audio device. First make sure, that it is active. If it is, and you still don't hear any sounds, ther is most likely a driver or hardwear issue. For futher help, you can check out this website: https://www.lifewire.com/fix-no-sound-windows-10-4587022

patterns: Is my diver up to date
I need help with my drivers
responses: To update your drivers, you should start the "Device Manager" and right click the driver, that you want to update. You can then just click on update driver. If you need more help, I can recomend this website: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/update-drivers-in-windows-10-ec62f46c-ff14-c91d-eead-d7126dc1f7b6
